name: @junctionjs/astro
description: Astro v5+ integration for Junction â€” script injection, SSR middleware, collect endpoint

scripts.build: tsup src/index.ts src/middleware.ts src/collect-endpoint.ts --format esm --dts --sourcemap --target es2022 --no-config --external @junctionjs/core --external @junctionjs/client --external astro --external astro:middleware
scripts.dev: tsup src/index.ts src/middleware.ts src/collect-endpoint.ts --format esm --dts --watch --no-config --external @junctionjs/core --external @junctionjs/client --external astro --external astro:middleware
